options.text: ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: This template will PERMANENTLY DELETE all Azure resources created by Firefly onboarding, including storage accounts, event grid topics, role assignments, and resource groups. This action cannot be undone. Please ensure you have backups of any important data before proceeding.

üóëÔ∏è Resources that will be DELETED:
‚Ä¢ All 'firefly-monitoring-*' resource groups
‚Ä¢ Storage accounts and their data
‚Ä¢ Event Grid topics and subscriptions
‚Ä¢ Diagnostic settings
‚Ä¢ Role assignments for Firefly service principal
‚Ä¢ Custom role definitions

‚úÖ Resources that will be PRESERVED:
‚Ä¢ Firefly API integrations (must be removed manually from Firefly dashboard)
‚Ä¢ Service principal (only role assignments will be removed)
‚Ä¢ Your existing Azure resources

toolTip.servicePrincipalId: Select the service principal used during Firefly onboarding. This is required to remove role assignments.

constraints.validationMessage: Please select the Firefly service principal

options.text: üí° Select the service principal that was created during Firefly onboarding. This is typically named something like 'Firefly-Integration' or similar. The selected service principal's role assignments will be removed from all target subscriptions.

elements.name: eventDrivenEnabled
elements.label: Event-Driven Monitoring was Enabled
elements.toolTip: Check this if event-driven monitoring was enabled during onboarding. This will ensure diagnostic settings and event grid resources are properly cleaned up.

elements.name: isMultiSubscription
elements.label: Multi-Subscription Cleanup
elements.toolTip: Enable to clean up Firefly monitoring from multiple subscriptions. When enabled, you can select the subscriptions to clean up.

options.text: ‚ö†Ô∏è Multi-subscription cleanup will remove Firefly monitoring infrastructure from ALL selected subscriptions. Ensure you have the necessary permissions in each subscription.

elements.name: targetSubscriptions
elements.label: Target Subscriptions
elements.toolTip: Select the subscriptions where you want to remove Firefly monitoring infrastructure. Only select subscriptions where Firefly was previously deployed.

elements.name: backupConfirmation
elements.label: I have backed up any important data from Firefly storage accounts
elements.toolTip: Confirm that you have backed up any important data that may be stored in Firefly storage accounts.

elements.name: permissionConfirmation
elements.label: I have sufficient permissions (Owner or Contributor + User Access Administrator) in all target subscriptions
elements.toolTip: Confirm that you have the necessary permissions to delete resources and role assignments in the target subscriptions.

options.text: üîÑ IMPORTANT REMINDER: After this cleanup completes, you must manually remove the Azure integration from your Firefly dashboard. This template only removes Azure resources, not the Firefly API integration configuration.

elements.name: finalConfirmation
elements.label: I understand this action is IRREVERSIBLE and will permanently delete all Firefly Azure resources
elements.toolTip: Final confirmation that you understand the consequences of this action.

elements.name: typeConfirmation
elements.label: Type 'DELETE' to confirm
elements.toolTip: Type 'DELETE' in capital letters to confirm you want to proceed with the cleanup.

constraints.validationMessage: You must type 'DELETE' exactly as shown (in capital letters)
